description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis - Get Rid Of Headache Using Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • What is migraine headache?
  • Why migraine headache happens?
  • How self hypnosis helps you get rid of migraine headache

You will be able to get rid of your headache and migraine using powerful self hypnosis techniques , relaxation techniques , visualization and affirmations.

You will be able to relax instantly and overcome stress and pain to achieve higher success in your life .This course is very useful for people who work under high stress and tension and require instant relaxation to overcome their migraine and headache problems

It is also ideal for sports people who can be subject to migraine attacks due to mental and physical strain

This course is in English and contains more than 30 minutes of video content and designed over 10 lectures and practical visualization exercises .This course contains -

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Creating A Relaxation Trigger

Lecture7:Learn A Powerful Visualization Exercise To Get Rid Of Migraine

Lecture 8:Another Powerful Visualization Exercise To Get Rid Of Migraine

Lecture 9:Audio File

Lecture 10: Summary

Lecture 11 : Bonus Exercise Uncovering the cause and developing confidence
title: Hypnosis - Get Rid Of Headache Using Self Hypnosis
